speaker: Luis
title: AIShow | Azure Cognitive Search Overview
description:
Search based apps are crucial for any business or enterprise for a variety of scenarios and end goals. This video helps the user understand what is azure cognitive search, the underlying technology, what unique capabilities does it offer and how can they can get started to build great apps for web, mobile or line of business. The video also highlights very specific capabilities for ingesting, enriching, indexing and visualization of the data.
